item.title: 黄金创纪录，白银因美联储降息前景而大涨
item.description: 两位美联储官员表示，他们仍预计美国央行将在2024年降息三次，这提振了贵金属的前景。【原文：Gold held near a fresh record and silver hit a two-year high as two Federal Reserve officials said they still expect the US central bank to cut rates three times in 2024, buoying the outlook for the precious metals.】

item.title: 印度顶级债券银行家认为影子银行融资成本高昂
item.description: 印度中央银行加强监管后，银行减少了对影子贷款机构的贷款，因此影子贷款机构必须为更高的债券借贷成本做好准备。【原文：India’s shadow lenders must brace for higher bond borrowing costs as banks reduce lending to the sector following tighter regulations by the nation’s central bank.】

item.title: 高油价下美国取消最新石油储备补充计划
item.description: 拜登政府不会在价格上涨的情况下推进为战略石油储备购买石油的最新计划。【原文：The Biden administration won’t move forward with its latest plans to buy oil for the Strategic Petroleum Reserve amid rising prices.】

item.title: 澳大利亚金矿公司仍计划在饱受战争蹂躏的苏丹钻探金矿
item.description: 澳大利亚黄金生产商珀尔修斯矿业有限公司（Perseus Mining Ltd.）并没有放弃在饱受战争蹂躏的苏丹开采黄金的长期计划，即使它在非洲各地寻求其他交易以维持产量。【原文：Australian gold producer Perseus Mining Ltd. hasn’t ditched a long-term plan to mine in war-torn Sudan, even as it chases other deals across Africa to sustain its output.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。乔-拜登和习近平通了电话。全球股市和债券下跌。特斯拉的交付令分析师失望。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. Joe Biden and Xi Jinping spoke by phone. Stocks and bonds dropped around the globe. Tesla deliveries disappointed analysts. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 美国库存减少和欧佩克+会议凸显石油上涨趋势
item.description: 在欧佩克+（OPEC+）会议召开之前，一份行业报告指出美国原油库存减少，预计该组织将在此次会议上确认当前的供应削减措施，石油延续涨势。【原文：Oil extended a rally after an industry report pointed to a drawdown in US crude inventories, ahead of an OPEC+ meeting at which the group is expected to affirm current supply cuts.】

item.title: 犹他州运输公司 Savage 探讨股权出售事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Savage Cos.是一家紧密控股的运输、物流和其他工业服务提供商，该公司正在探索各种方案，包括出售少数股权。【原文：Savage Cos., a closely held provider of transportation, logistics and other industrial services, is exploring options including the sale of a minority stake, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美联储押注转向，台币期权市场乐观情绪消退
item.description: 据期权市场密切关注的一项指标显示，台币的短暂看涨期似乎已经结束。【原文：A brief period of bullishness on the Taiwan dollar looks to be over, according to a closely-watched measure in the options market.】

item.title: 降息乐观情绪消退，亚洲股市下跌：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市将跟随华尔街走低，此前稳健的经济数据和大宗商品的反弹刺激了人们对主要央行将在更长时间内维持较高利率的猜测。【原文：Stocks in Asia are set to follow Wall Street lower after solid economic readings and a rally in commodities spurred speculation that major central banks will keep interest rates higher for longer.】

item.title: 佛罗里达州高速铁路高级债券被评为投资级
item.description: Brightline 是一个多世纪以来美国第一家私营客运铁路公司，在计划对 36 亿美元债务进行再融资之前，其拟发行的高级市政债券获得了投资级评级。【原文：Brightline, the first private US passenger railroad in more than a century, obtained an investment-grade rating on its proposed senior municipal bonds in advance of a planned refinancing of $3.6 billion of debt.】

item.title: <strong>交易商做好准备，以防股市开始震荡</strong
item.description:
在今天的 Big Take 播客中，期权市场表明投资者并不担心小幅回调，而是在为更高的波动性做准备。

【原文：

On today’s Big Take podcast, the options market suggests investors aren’t worried about a slight pullback, but instead are preparing for higher volatility.

】

item.title: 软银支持的窗户制造商将申请破产以削减债务
item.description: 软银集团（SoftBank Group）部分持股的窗户制造商 View Inc.【原文：View Inc., a window-maker partly owned by SoftBank Group, will file bankruptcy with a proposal to turn itself over to lenders in exchange for reducing its debt load, the company announced Tuesday.】

item.title: Perpetual 称人工智能将推动 CBA 等澳大利亚银行股的发展
item.description: Perpetual Investment Management Ltd.的选股专家安东尼-阿布德（Anthony Aboud）正在为人工智能给澳大利亚银行带来的好处提前下注。【原文：Perpetual Investment Management Ltd. stock picker Anthony Aboud is putting on an early wager on the benefits of artificial intelligence for Australia’s banks.】

item.title: 迪斯尼在特里安代理权争夺战中领先，大部分选票已计算在内
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在与纳尔逊-佩尔茨（Nelson Peltz）的特里亚基金管理公司（Trian Fund Management）进行的代理权争夺战中，华特-迪士尼公司管理层以超过 60% 的计票结果遥遥领先。【原文：Walt Disney Co.’s management is pulling ahead with more than 60% of the votes counted in its proxy fight with Nelson Peltz’s Trian Fund Management, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 花旗集团称纽约总检察长的在线欺诈诉讼是 "误导 "之举
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.）要求法官驳回纽约州就消费者在线保护问题提起的诉讼，认为该案是总检察长莱蒂西亚-詹姆斯（Letitia James）改写联邦法律的 "错误企图"。【原文：Citigroup Inc. asked a judge to throw out a suit by the State of New York over online protections for consumers, arguing the case was a “misguided attempt” by Attorney General Letitia James to rewrite federal law.】

item.title: 降息概率下降，债券交易员加大看跌押注
item.description: 由于美国经济增长强劲的新证据引发了对美联储利率政策预期的重新调整，债券交易员们纷纷押注看跌，加剧了基准国债的抛售。【原文：Bond traders are piling into bearish bets, fueling a selloff in benchmark Treasury securities, as fresh evidence of robust US growth triggers a recalibration of expectations for Federal Reserve interest-rate policy.】

item.title: 阿美石油交易商因奖金问题在休斯顿举行罢工
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，沙特阿美公司休斯顿办事处的几名石油交易员上周在收到比预期少的奖金后举行了短暂的罢工。【原文：Several oil traders in Saudi Aramco’s Houston office staged a brief walkout last week after receiving smaller bonuses than expected, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 分析师称，与丝绸之路有关的美国数字钱包在转移比特币
item.description: 据几家区块链分析公司称，美国政府的一个账户持有从前黑市网站 "丝绸之路 "没收的近20亿美元比特币，在预计最终清算这些资产之前，该账户周二完成了几笔交易。【原文：A U.S. government account holding almost $2 billion in Bitcoin confiscated from the former black-market website Silk Road completed several transactions Tuesday ahead of an expected eventual liquidation of the assets, according to several blockchain analytics firms.】

item.title: 华尔街利用杠杆做空 ETF 抓住比特币波动的机会
item.description: 围绕现货比特币交易所交易基金推出的狂热仍未减退，因为华尔街最新加入者提供了此类产品的超级版本。【原文：The frenzy surrounding the launch of spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds has yet to lose steam as Wall Street’s latest entrant offers supercharged versions of such products.】

item.title: 零售商 Express 举行破产融资谈判
item.description: 据知情人士透露，零售商 Express Inc. 正在要求其贷款人提供资金，以帮助为可能的破产保护程序提供资金。【原文：Retailer Express Inc. is asking its lenders for funds to help finance a potential Chapter 11 bankruptcy process, according to people with knowledge of the plans.】

item.title: 美国天气转好，玉米出现二月以来最严重的两日下滑
item.description: 玉米期货结束了自二月份以来的最大两日跌幅，因为交易商关注春播天气的好转。【原文：Corn futures capped their biggest two-day decline since February as traders focused on better weather for spring planting.】

item.title: 特朗普因股份问题起诉 "真相 "社交媒体公司联合创始人
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对他的联合创始人提起诉讼，声称他们违反了成立这家社交媒体公司的协议，根本不应该获得公司的任何股份，从而加剧了新上市的特朗普媒体与科技集团公司（Trump Media & Technology Group Corp.【原文：Donald Trump has ramped up a battle over shares in his newly public Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. with a lawsuit against his co-founders, claiming they violated an agreement setting up the social media company and shouldn’t get any stock in it at all.】

item.title: 私募公司指数基金让押注独角兽更容易
item.description: 希望利用私营公司增长的合格投资者现在有办法简化支持哪家独角兽公司的难题了。有一种指数基金可以解决这个问题。【原文：Qualified investors looking to tap the growth of privately-held companies now have a way to simplify the dilemma of which unicorns to back. There’s an index fund for that.】

item.title: 高盛部门抢购肯尼迪-刘易斯私人信贷赌注股份
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s Petershill unit agreed to buy a minority stake in Kennedy Lewis Investment Management — yet another bet by Wall Street’s biggest firms in the continued growth of the market for private assets.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称正在进行的审查将为肯尼亚释放更多融资
item.description: 国际货币基金组织计划在完成对肯尼亚于 2021 年签署的计划的持续审查后，向肯尼亚拨付更多资金。【原文：The International Monetary Fund plans to disburse additional financing to Kenya after completing an ongoing review of the nation’s program signed in 2021.】

item.title: 拉扎德的麦克马斯特说，"精心策划 "的交易能赢得监管部门的批准
item.description: 拉扎德公司全球并购主管马克-麦克马斯特（Mark McMaster）说，如果 "计划周密"，参与交易的公司提前做好监管工作，重大并购就能通过监管审查。【原文：Major acquisitions can get through regulatory scrutiny if they are “well-planned,” with regulatory work done by companies involved in the deals ahead of time, said Mark McMaster, Lazard Inc.’s global head of mergers and acquisitions.】

item.title: 美联储戴利称 2024 年三次降息是合理基线
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）表示，对2024年来说，三次降息仍是合理的预期，不过目前并不急于做出调整。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco President Mary Daly said three interest-rate cuts is still a reasonable expectation for 2024, though there’s no urgency to make adjustments at the moment.】

item.title: 航运业资深人士称美国主要港口正在突破吞吐能力极限
item.description: 航运业资深人士约翰-麦考恩表示，美国最大港口的吞吐能力已达到极限，需要进行扩建，以应对入境航运的预期增长。【原文：The biggest US ports are stretching capacity limits and need to expand to handle anticipated growth in inbound shipping, according to shipping industry veteran John McCown.】

item.title: 地缘政治风险上升，石油期权市场转为看涨
item.description: 随着中东紧张局势的升级，石油期权交易商正越来越多地寻求防范原油价格的上涨。【原文：Oil options traders are increasingly looking to protect against rising crude prices as tensions escalate in the Middle East.】

item.title: 加密风险投资公司 Paradigm 正在洽谈为基金募集超过 7.5 亿美元的资金
item.description: 在加密货币卷土重来之后，越来越多的风险资本家竞相筹集新资金。【原文：More venture capitalists are racing to raise new funds following a crypto comeback.】
